title: PSL 2025 draft picks, live updates: Full list of players signed up for the draft
description: The registration process for the upcoming edition of the Pakistan Super League draft scheduled on January 11 is currently underway – here's the real-time update on the list of players signed up for the PSL 2025 draft so far.
author: Atri Sanfui
excerpt: The registration process for the PSL 2025 draft, set to be held in Pakistan’s city of Gwadar on January 11 is currently underway – here’s the real-time update on the list of players signed up for the draft so far.
text: Dec 24, 2024 1 minute read News The registration process for the upcoming edition of the Pakistan Super League draft scheduled on January 11 is currently underway – here's the real-time update on the list of players signed up for the PSL 2025 draft so far. Unlike previous editions, the draft for the Pakistan Super League will be placed later than usual, owing to the reported pushback of the commencement date of the tournament from its regular February-March window. It is set to clash with the IPL now. For the first time, the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) have decided to conduct the draft in Balochistan, the country's largest province. As per the latest announcements, the draft will be taking place in the port city of Gwadar. The PCB announced the pick order for the player draft of the 10 edition of the tournament. Two-time champions Lahore Qalandars will make the first pick in the platinum category followed by Karachi Kings. 2019 title winners Quetta Gladiators will make the third pick, while Peshawar Zalmi will have the fourth. Defending runners-up, Multan Sultans, and champions Islamabad United will make the fifth and sixth picks, respectively. — PakistanSuperLeague (@thePSLt20) December 23, 2024 PSL 2025 draft: All the signings so far Follow Wisden for all cricket updates, including live scores, match stats, quizzes and more. html:
Dec 24, 2024 1 minute read News

The registration process for the upcoming edition of the Pakistan Super League draft scheduled on January 11 is currently underway – here's the real-time update on the list of players signed up for the PSL 2025 draft so far.

Unlike previous editions, the draft for the Pakistan Super League will be placed later than usual, owing to the reported pushback of the commencement date of the tournament from its regular February-March window. It is set to clash with the IPL now.

For the first time, the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) have decided to conduct the draft in Balochistan, the country's largest province. As per the latest announcements, the draft will be taking place in the port city of Gwadar.

The PCB announced the pick order for the player draft of the 10 edition of the tournament. Two-time champions Lahore Qalandars will make the first pick in the platinum category followed by Karachi Kings. 2019 title winners Quetta Gladiators will make the third pick, while Peshawar Zalmi will have the fourth.

Defending runners-up, Multan Sultans, and champions Islamabad United will make the fifth and sixth picks, respectively.

— PakistanSuperLeague (@thePSLt20) December 23, 2024
